fr.gouv.vitam.common

Class PropertiesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.common.PropertiesUtils

  • public final class PropertiesUtils
extends Object
    Property Utility class NOTE for developers: Do not add LOGGER there
